title: Swash on the W but not Caslon, Bookman, Farnham etc..time sensitive please assist
content:
This is a patch with the sample of font I need identified. It is italic, with a swash on the W..similar to Cooper Swash or Bookman Swash? Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Image%201_5680.png)

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174306/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: pariah73

comments.content:
If you know the name of the embroidery company you might be able to get the precise name they use.  
Don

Too many names (as usual) - I don't know which (if any) of them is the original, so be careful if you need to acquire a license for a commercial project:

**SwordsmanCondensed (Italic)** - Copyright 1986-1995 SWFTE International, Ltd  
**WhiteWaterRaft27 ttcon** - Copyright (c) 1994 ImageLine Incorporated.  
**White** - Copyright (c) 1994 ImageLine Incorporated.  
**Merced (Italic)** - Copyright 1991, Atech Software, Carlsbad CA  
**VNI-Chancery** - Copyright (c) VNI 1995. All rights reserved.  
**Alighieri** - 1998 ScenoGrafica Software By Joe Hoffman  
**BD Merced** - Copyright Streetwise Software, Inc.

Some of them may require slanting and/or emboldening to match your sample.

You are incredibly fabulous! Thank you! It was not Merced (Italic) or BD Merced. Aside from that, I could not find differences in the others listed. Therefore I don't know for sure which one it is but any of them will do quite nicely :)
